RelationalDatabaseParameter.description: Describes the parameters of the database.

properties.name: AllowedValues
properties.description: Specifies the valid range of values for the parameter.

type.description: Specifies the valid range of values for the parameter.

properties.name: ApplyMethod
properties.description: Indicates when parameter updates are applied. Can be immediate or pending-reboot.

type.description: Indicates when parameter updates are applied. Can be immediate or pending-reboot.

properties.name: ApplyType
properties.description: Specifies the engine-specific parameter type.

type.description: Specifies the engine-specific parameter type.

properties.name: DataType
properties.description: Specifies the valid data type for the parameter.

type.description: Specifies the valid data type for the parameter.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: Provides a description of the parameter.

type.description: Provides a description of the parameter.

properties.name: IsModifiable
properties.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the parameter can be modified.

type.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the parameter can be modified.

properties.name: ParameterName
properties.description: Specifies the name of the parameter.

type.description: Specifies the name of the parameter.

properties.name: ParameterValue
properties.description: Specifies the value of the parameter.

type.description: Specifies the value of the parameter.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: AvailabilityZone
properties.description: The Availability Zone in which to create your new database. Use the us-east-2a case-sensitive format.

type.description: The Availability Zone in which to create your new database. Use the us-east-2a case-sensitive format.

properties.name: BackupRetention
properties.description: When true, enables automated backup retention for your database. Updates are applied during the next maintenance window because this can result in an outage.

type.description: When true, enables automated backup retention for your database. Updates are applied during the next maintenance window because this can result in an outage.

properties.name: CaCertificateIdentifier
properties.description: Indicates the certificate that needs to be associated with the database.

type.description: Indicates the certificate that needs to be associated with the database.

properties.name: MasterDatabaseName
properties.description: The name of the database to create when the Lightsail database resource is created. For MySQL, if this parameter isn't specified, no database is created in the database resource. For PostgreSQL, if this parameter isn't specified, a database named postgres is created in the database resource.

type.description: The name of the database to create when the Lightsail database resource is created. For MySQL, if this parameter isn't specified, no database is created in the database resource. For PostgreSQL, if this parameter isn't specified, a database named postgres is created in the database resource.

properties.name: MasterUserPassword
properties.description: The password for the master user. The password can include any printable ASCII character except "/", """, or "@". It cannot contain spaces.

type.description: The password for the master user. The password can include any printable ASCII character except "/", """, or "@". It cannot contain spaces.

properties.name: MasterUsername
properties.description: The name for the master user.

type.description: The name for the master user.

properties.name: PreferredBackupWindow
properties.description: The daily time range during which automated backups are created for your new database if automated backups are enabled.

type.description: The daily time range during which automated backups are created for your new database if automated backups are enabled.

properties.name: PreferredMaintenanceWindow
properties.description: The weekly time range during which system maintenance can occur on your new database.

type.description: The weekly time range during which system maintenance can occur on your new database.

properties.name: PubliclyAccessible
properties.description: Specifies the accessibility options for your new database. A value of true specifies a database that is available to resources outside of your Lightsail account. A value of false specifies a database that is available only to your Lightsail resources in the same region as your database.

type.description: Specifies the accessibility options for your new database. A value of true specifies a database that is available to resources outside of your Lightsail account. A value of false specifies a database that is available only to your Lightsail resources in the same region as your database.

properties.name: RelationalDatabaseBlueprintId
properties.description: The blueprint ID for your new database. A blueprint describes the major engine version of a database.

type.description: The blueprint ID for your new database. A blueprint describes the major engine version of a database.

properties.name: RelationalDatabaseBundleId
properties.description: The bundle ID for your new database. A bundle describes the performance specifications for your database.

type.description: The bundle ID for your new database. A bundle describes the performance specifications for your database.

properties.name: RelationalDatabaseName
properties.description: The name to use for your new Lightsail database resource.

type.description: The name to use for your new Lightsail database resource.

properties.name: RelationalDatabaseParameters
properties.description: Update one or more parameters of the relational database.

type.description: Update one or more parameters of the relational database.

properties.name: RotateMasterUserPassword
properties.description: When true, the master user password is changed to a new strong password generated by Lightsail. Use the get relational database master user password operation to get the new password.

type.description: When true, the master user password is changed to a new strong password generated by Lightsail. Use the get relational database master user password operation to get the new password.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
